abstract: Speaker Nancy Pelosi signaled she could soon send articles of impeachment to the Senate.
lead_paragraph: While impeachment stalls in the gray area between the House and the Senate, we thought we’d answer some questions from Impeachment Briefing readers. You can send us your questions by email here, and we’ll get our colleagues to answer a few in tomorrow’s newsletter. (Please include your first name and home state, or country if you’re outside the U.S.)
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
